March 14, 1982 D Yorkshire Area (Championship Section)
Yorkshire Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Area yorkshire-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
Yorkshire
Championship
Essay [Gregson]
St. George's Hall, Bradford, West Yorkshire, England, UK Black Dyke and Brighouse already invited to finals, Grimethorpe touring Australia. 6 bands competed.
March 21, 2010, 3:02 p.m. June 18, 2014, 10:48 a.m.
